entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
